name: Tut's Tomb
summary: Located in the **Valley of the Kings, Egypt**, King Tutankhamun’s tomb remained hidden for over 3,000 years because it was accidentally buried under the rock debris of a later tomb built directly above it. Among its 5,000 treasures was a ceremonial dagger forged from a **meteorite**—a material the ancient Egyptians highly prized and literally called "iron from the sky."
